overview: In May of 2013, The Okee Dokee Brothers hiked sections of the Appalachian Trail. During their month-long journey on the trail, they camped, hiked, and composed the songs that make up the album, Through the Woods. This 50-minute movie details their adventure with interviews, music videos, and other shenanigans set in the Appalachian wilderness.
tagline: Two life-long friends writing songs through the Appalachian Mountains.
title: Through the Woods
